 = Useful Links =
This page hold the useful links:
* http://wavedrom.com/ - A Javascript Based online Digital IC Design waveform
  drawer.
* http://www.graphviz.org/ - Graph visualization is a way of representing structural information as diagrams of abstract graphs and networks
* [[http://vrq.sourceforge.net/html/index.html|VRQ]] : VRQ is modular verilog parser that supports plugin tools to process
  verilog,In particular the Xprop Tool is one of it's most unique features as when it is used properly it can greatly reduce the need for gate level simulation.
* CPP reference: http://en.cppreference.com/w/
